member.name: M:ProdigyAPI.Controllers.Sales.SalesBillingController.DeriveEstimateBalances(ProdigyAPI.BL.ViewModel.Sales.SalesInfoQueryVM)
member.summary: Calculates the final Balance Amount including discounts if any. Note: 1. Ensure that you pass CalculateFinalAmount as false to fetch the details of the estimation. 2. And pass CalculateFinalAmount as true to calculate discounts. 3. The RowVersion must be passed as null to get the estimate detail, but to calculate the discount, a value which is obtained by the previous call of Derive-Estimation-Balances must be passed. 4. Either of difference DifferenceDiscountAmt or ReceivableAmount must be passed, not both. 5. In case of Receivable Amount ensure that you pass positive value for ReceivableAmount. In case of payble, it must be negative.
member.param: The details of the estimation in question
member.returns: returns SalesCompleteInfoVM on success

member.name: M:ProdigyAPI.Controllers.UserManagement.UsersController.Add(ProdigyAPI.BL.ViewModel.UserManagement.OperatorViewModel)
member.summary: Posts a new user. Ensure that the password is base64 encoded and meets the password requirements. The allowed values for Status is one of these: Active or Closed OperatorType must either be: Admin or Others DefaultStore is the store to which the user can login by default. MappedStores are the list of stores to which the user is mapped. When adding a new user, ensure that the store which creates the user must be one in the mappedstores

member.name: M:ProdigyAPI.Controllers.UserManagement.UsersController.Update(ProdigyAPI.BL.ViewModel.UserManagement.OperatorViewModel)
member.summary: Updates an existing user. Password must be base64 encoded and meets the password requirements. Only active users can be modified. The allowed values for Status is one of these: Active or Closed OperatorType must either be: Admin or Others. DefaultStore is the store to which the user can login by default. MappedStores are the list of stores to which the user is mapped. When adding a new user, ensure that the store which creates the user must be one in the mappedstores
